price: (71) And they say, "When is [the fulfillment of] this promise, if you should be truthful?"
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-waʿdu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
